text: Charles Daniel Ferris (born April 9, 1933, died February 16, 2024) is an American lawyer and former government official. He was nominated by President Jimmy Carter to chair the Federal Communications Commission in 1977. He left office in 1981. ==References== Category:Living people Category:1933 births Category:Lawyers from Boston Category:Chairmen of the Federal Communications Commission Category:Politicians from Boston Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Charles D. Ferris
